backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage mixins and extensive type models for media, users, ads, wallets, approvals, and affiliate systems.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode overlays, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root mount and script to load the frontend application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration registering all public and admin routes using AdminRouteGuard and Layout.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Displays a single banner ad for a placement, tracking views and clicks via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCapab: Shows an alert with icon and title based on admin capability states such as unavailable, empty, or error.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessDenie: Styled access-denied screen shown to non-admin users with navigation back to home.
Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status with loading and denial states.
frontend/src/components/AdSidebar.tsx: Renders up to three sidebar ads for a placement and tracks their views and clicks.
Renders a grid of genre category cards that navigate to category pages when clicked.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoomComponen: Implements a chat room with polling, file uploads, message sending, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ContentCard.tsx: Displays a media item card with icon, metadata, and hover actions for selection.
frontend/src/components/ContentGrid.tsx: Shows tabs for all and popular content, renders content cards, and opens a player on selection.
frontend/src/components/ContentPlayer.ts: Provides a modal media player supporting video, audio, basic controls, and user rating.
frontend/src/components/DisplayScreen.ts: Displays currently active content with autoplay video and type badge or fallback text.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with navigation links, social icons, and admin login handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with navigation, search, authentication actions, and admin menu handling for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with animated visuals, marketing text, and buttons linking to streaming partners and wallet pages.
frontend/src/components/HeroHelper.tsx: Interactive assistant widget with chat, speech recognition, speech synthesis, user memory, and personalized greetings.
frontend/src/components/JitsiMeetIntegra: Embeds Jitsi Meet to host video conferences with room creation, participant tracking, and media controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper that applies route‑based backgrounds and renders header, footer, content outlet, and optional HeroHelper.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple modal form allowing users to enter and save their name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/SharedPlaybackCo: UI card for shared playback rooms, showing preview, viewer count, and controls to play or create a room.
frontend/src/components/VersionBadge.tsx: Empty component that hides version info by rendering nothing.
frontend/src/components/VideoCallCompone: Provides a video call UI with mute, video toggle, and end-call controls using a static preview image.
frontend/src/components/WAN22Integration: Implements a form-driven interface to simulate WAN 2.2 AI content generation with project creation, tabs, and mock API behavior.
frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts: Defines admin navigation items, section ordering, and route mappings for the admin dashboard UI.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports an empty application version constant.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
Maps backend actor methods to capability flags and returns them with loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Combines identity and admin checks to determine when admin UI should be displayed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin status, approvals, and related mutations using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, theme variables, layout rules, and utility classes for consistent UI behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by creating the React root and wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAdsPage.tsx: Implements an admin UI for listing, creating, editing, deleting, and toggling ads with capability checks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAffiliatePage.ts: Provides an admin page to view and create affiliate tiers via dialogs and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApprovalPage.tsx: Displays multiple approval queues and provides actions to approve or reject various pending items.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContentPage.tsx: Provides a form to upload new multimedia content and lists existing items with delete support using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDisplayPage.tsx: Manages theater display content by showing the active item and providing a form to upload new display screen content.
Displays pending content submissions with search, allowing admins to approve, reject, or delete various content types.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHiiYahChatPage.t: Administers chat-related requests, enabling approval or rejection of broadcast and hero join submissions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminImageLibraryPage: Offers image upload, approval, rejection, and mass-delete tools while listing pending and approved images.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteAcceptPage: Handles reading an invite token from the URL, prompting for Internet Identity login if needed, and redeeming the admin invite via the backend before redirecting to admin approvals.
Allows admins to generate, view, and copy invitation codes by fetching invite codes from the backend and creating new ones.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMallPage.tsx: Provides a local-state mall management UI for creating, editing, and deleting mall items with modal dialogs and summary stats.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMediaUploadRoomP: Provides an admin-only interface to upload media content with progress tracking and lists existing uploaded items.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMemberDirectoryP: Fetches and displays all user profiles for admins with search and role filtering, handling missing backend capabilities gracefully.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPriceControlRoom: Admin interface for updating subscription, content, and mall-related prices with save actions and access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPricingTermsPage: Allows admins to view, edit, and publish pricing plans and terms, including loading active terms and creating new versions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoomsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of admin sections and links, letting admins navigate to different management areas.
frontend/src/pages/AdminWalletManagement: Provides mock BTC wallet monitoring and recovery UI with seed visibility toggles and balance history charts.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Shows referral stats, tier information, and lets users generate and copy their affiliate referral link.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays media content by category, allowing users to open a selected item in a content player.
frontend/src/pages/CreditCardPage.tsx: Displays a mock Excalibur credit card with holographic visuals and allows users to enter an amount, though loading balance is not yet implemented.
Provides a creative workspace interface featuring Jitsi Meet and WAN 2.2 integrations with tabbed sections and project navigation.
frontend/src/pages/FlixiodTestPage.tsx: Offers a test page for Flixiod streaming with an embedded player and links to open the platform externally.
frontend/src/pages/HiiYahChatPage.tsx: Implements a Rocket.Chat‑powered chat interface with tabs for messaging, calls, and shared playback, with many features marked as coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Serves as the main landing page with hero content, featured categories, global streaming overview, and financial services highlights.
frontend/src/pages/IHeartRadioTestPage.t: Provides a test page with an embedded iHeartRadio player, navigation, and info cards for streaming integration.
frontend/src/pages/MallPage.tsx: Displays Clear Magic Mall branding with a search bar and a coming-soon notice for future shopping features.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Implements a sign-up form with validation, simulated submission, and a confirmation screen after registration.
frontend/src/pages/StreamingPartnersPage: Lists streaming platforms with navigation to test pages or external links, using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays active terms and conditions, handling loading and missing-content states.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Manages Bitcoin wallet creation, loading funds, and viewing wallet info with Counterparty node integration.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended frontend-only TypeScript types mirroring expected backend structures for media, approvals, ads, affiliates, wallet, chat, and other entities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, container settings, animations, keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature request tracking for the admin-area work.
